channel.title: How to add shops?
channel.description: i'm stupid and completely forgot how to make a shop open when you click an npc. I made it on my server so when you press the shops emote it opens a menu wit 4 choices all shops and u can press it and open the shop. But i want to make some npc shops. Please tell me how to do this im stupid.
